title: Accessibility Statement
intro: This accessibility statement applies to the Antesto Oy BrightFlow website (brightflow.fi). We strive to ensure our website is accessible to all users regardless of their abilities or assistive technologies.

status.title: 1. Accessibility Status
status.content: This website largely meets the WCAG 2.1 Level AA requirements. We are committed to continuously improving the accessibility of our site and addressing any issues.

features.title: 2. Accessibility Features
features.description: We have implemented the following accessibility features:
items: The site is fully navigable by keyboard
Images have descriptive alt text for screen readers
Colour contrast levels meet AA requirements
Text can be resized without loss of functionality
Form fields have clear labels and helper text
The site structure is semantically correct (heading levels, landmarks)
Links and buttons are clearly distinguishable

knownIssues.title: 3. Known Issues
knownIssues.content: We are not currently aware of any significant accessibility issues. If you encounter any problems, please contact us.

feedback.title: 4. Feedback & Contact
feedback.description: We welcome feedback on our site's accessibility. If you encounter any issues or have suggestions for improvement, please contact us:
feedback.responseTime: We aim to respond to accessibility-related enquiries within 14 days.

authority.title: 5. Supervisory Authority
authority.description: If you notice accessibility issues on the site and are not satisfied with the response you receive, you can file a report with the Regional State Administrative Agency for Southern Finland:
authority.agencyName: Regional State Administrative Agency for Southern Finland, Accessibility Supervision Unit

update.title: 6. Statement Update
update.content: This accessibility statement was prepared on {{date}}. The statement is updated as needed, at the latest when significant changes are made to the site.
